summary: A Cattle Herd with a cattle herder named Harvey LeBeouf and his trusty herding dogs. Near Dragon Bridge.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Blue][font=Impact][size=7]Cattle Herd by Fall Hammer[/size][/font][/color]

[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50171/?]German Translation by Kingwulf here[/URL]

Cattle Herd is a simple mod that adds several cows, a cattle herder named Harvey LeBeouf, and his two trusty herding dogs. There is also a tent and campfire to to keep Harvey dry and warm.
I created this mod as a compliment to:[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start-Live Another Life by Arthmoor[/URL] and [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50093/?]Dragon Bridge Manor an Adoption Friendly Home by pinkstarfish[/URL]

As both those are within a cow paddy toss from where the herd is located, and make for a great roleplaying experience as with Live Another Life if you choose the Karnsdale Farm location, you can collect "Farm Profits" from the farmer, and live the life of Lord/Landowner in the Dragon Bridge Manor over looking both the herd and the farm.

Another Mod that is compatible is
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25439/?]Bridge Farm by Gentester[/URL] If using with Dragon Bridge Manor load Bridge Farm last(fixes any landscape issues).

Note: Bridge Farm is NOT compatible with Live Another Life, as LAL's Karnsdale Farmhouse, is in the same spot.

For the ultimate Farming/Cow herding experience I would also suggest
[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25239/?]Berts Hearthfire Dairy Goods Upgrade by Berticus0001[/URL] as this adds COW MILKING!!!!!


So I hope you enjoy, and as usual this requires the latest version of Skyrim (no DLC required unless using mod that requires them)

Fall Hammer

Now also [URL=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=218825761]Cattle Herd on Steam Workshop[/URL]

Update Info:
Version 1.0 Initial Upload

Version 1.1 Cleaned with TES5Edit Hmm smells fresh.

Version 1.2 Small tweaks to make compatible with Bridge Farm, moved tent, fire, and 1 dog.

Version 1.3 Added FaceGenData textures and meshes to prevent "Grey Face Bug"
author: Fall Hammer
